name: Love Story Quiz | Love Story | 10 Questions

questions.text: 'Love Story' tracks Jenny's relationship with a fellow she calls Barrett. What's his full name?
questions.explanation:
Oliver Barrett IV.

	According to the movie, Barrett's great-grandfather donated Barrett Hall to Harvard.

questions.text: What does Jenny's father do for a living?
options: He sits around and looks important
questions.explanation:
He bakes pastries.

	Pastries! NOT cookies! Or so Jenny insists.

questions.text: How do Jenny and Barrett feel about the 'church bit' (and the 'God bit')?
questions.explanation:
negative.

	This causes Jenny's Catholic father some concern.

questions.text: Barrett's falling-out with his father causes some difficulty when it comes time for Barrett to pay for what?
questions.explanation:
law school.

	He doesn't receive financial aid because he's a Barrett, and Barretts don't NEED financial aid.

questions.text: What is Jenny's great unsatisfied interest?
questions.explanation:
music.

	She gave up a scholarship to study music in Paris so that she could marry Barrett. (Aw! Ain't that SWEET?)

questions.text: What does the doctor tell Barrett Jenny is dying of?
questions.explanation:
He doesn't specify.

	Seemed odd that Barrett never questioned that rather sketchy diagnosis ...

questions.text: What sport did Barrett play at Harvard?
questions.explanation:
ice hockey.

	Barrett was singlehandedly responsible for losing the title to Cornell (so sad!) And yes, ballroom dancing is a sport. The Australian movie 'Strictly Ballroom' is hilarious, by the way. It's a much, much better movie than 'Love Story.'

questions.text: When Barrett gives Jenny his father's phone number and she dials, many audience members become amused. Why?
questions.correct: She isn't dialing the number he gave her! She's dialing 555-5555!
options: It's all about the look on Barrett's face.
It's a Pacific Bell phone in Washington, DC! (a Bell Atlantic region)
The phone is hot pink with glittery rally stripes.
questions.explanation:
She isn't dialing the number he gave her! She's dialing 555-5555!.

	The Pacific Bell payphone in Washington DC was actually a gaffe from the film 'Die Hard 2'.

questions.text: Jenny and Barrett move to what city in order to pursue Barrett's career?
questions.explanation:
New York City.

	Jenny dies in New York.

questions.text: Early in the movie, Barrett asks Jenny, 'Who's Phil?' after she ends a phone call. So, for $64,000, who IS Phil?
questions.explanation:
Jenny's father.

	Phil doesn't believe in titles like 'Dad' or 'Mister.' He's enlightened, and everything. I think he's supposed to be the comic relief, but I'm not sure, because he wasn't comic. He was, however, just about the sole likeable person in the entire movie. (IMHO)
